## odcli record import

Import records to database

### Synopsis


Import records to database

```
odcli record import [<path> ...]
```

### Options

```
  -a, --asset[=true]: upload assets
  -d, --basedir="": base path for locating files to be uploaded
      --prompt-complex[=true]: prompt when complex value is used
```
